list.title: Material Design
list.text: A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion. The material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yet technologically advanced and open to imagination and magic.

list.title: Angular Material
list.text: Angular Material is both a UI Component framework and a reference implementation of Google's Material Design Specification. This project provides a set of reusable, well-tested, and accessible UI components based on Material Design.

list.title: MaterialUp
list.text: MaterialUp curates the best of Material Design inspiration, tools and freebies. Get your daily dose of Material design inspiration!
